job_details.experience_required: Minimum 5 years of experience in data engineering or ETL development.
job_details.degree_required: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.

jd: From: ayush, Scalable Systems ayush.yadav@scalable-systems.com Reply to: ayush.yadav@scalable-systems.com Job Description: Data ETL Technical LeadLocation: Stamford, CTKey Responsibilities:Database Management:Deep understanding of relational and non-relational database management system concepts.Proficiency in database technologies like Snowflake, SQL Server, and Oracle.Expertise in writing efficient SQL queries, functions, and stored procedures for data transformation and manipulation.Business Intelligence:Strong foundation in business intelligence concepts, including data lake, data mart, and data warehousing.Ability to translate complex business requirements into clear data and technical specifications.Data Analysis:Proven skills in data analysis and data modeling.Experience in conducting data profiling, data quality assessments, and gap analysis.ETL Development:Design and architect ETL solutions using industry-standard tools and technologies.Develop and maintain ETL code, workflows, and mappings.Conduct unit testing, integration testing, and support UAT and production environments.Project Management:Provide regular status updates to stakeholders.Collaborate with cross-functional teams and offshore counterparts.Ensure alignment with project goals and timelines.Technical Skills:Proficiency in scripting languages like SQL/PL-SQL, Python, and Java.Experience with Agile methodologies and tools like JIRA.Knowledge of cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP).Required Qualifications:Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.Minimum 5 years of experience in data engineering or ETL development.Strong understanding of data warehousing and data modeling concepts.Experience with ETL tools (e.g., Informatica, Talend, SSIS).Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.Ability to work independently and as part of a team.Strong communication and interpersonal skills.Preferred Qualifications:Certification in data engineering or cloud technologies.Experience with big data technologies (Hadoop, Spark).Familiarity with data governance and data quality frameworks.
